summary: Created translation export system for Excel editing. Exported all 295 translation keys from en.json, ru.json, and tk.json to translations-export.csv file. Created export script (scripts/export-translations-to-excel.js) and import script (scripts/import-translations-from-excel.js). Created comprehensive documentation (TRANSLATION_EXPORT_README.md) with instructions for editing and importing translations. CSV file is Excel-compatible and includes all website translations: header, footer, hero, gallery, about, collaboration, contact sections, buttons, labels, certificates, and all UI elements.
current_status: Translation export system ready. translations-export.csv file contains all 295 translation keys with Key, English, Russian, and Turkmen columns. User can now edit translations in Excel and re-import using the import script. All translation keys from the website are included in the export.
